page.title: 13THE GRANGE MUSEUM NEASDEN
page.content:
{The Grange Museum}is our local museum. It is situated in the middle of a busy roundabout only accessible by bridge. It is not used very much. Old people use it because they like to see things that they remember from when they were young and because it helps them pass the time.Lots of local schools use it to find out about local history.If the museum was made bigger, it would be easier to get around inside.We thought the most interesting thing was the {marble table}in the entrance hall.The marble came from all over the world and had interesting patterns in it. If we made posters and stuck them on lamp-posts and windows more people would know that we have a good museum in Neasden.We could even send up a giant air balloon saying:-
{VISIT THE GRANGE MUSEUM NEASDEN
